text: Navid Jamshidi was born on October 26, 1983, in Tehran, Iran. He is an independent journalist and the editor-in-chief of Asia newspaper in Iran. == Detention by the government == Navid Jamshidi has been arrested several times due to his journalism work. His arrests are linked to his reports and editorial activities in Asia newspaper. Each time, he was detained by authorities and faced legal charges related to freedom of speech and press. His cases have drawn attention from media and human rights organizations. == References == Category:Journalists Category:Journalists by nationality Category:Iranian activists Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:People from Tehran
title: Navid Jamshidi
